openChicagoPizza() - Method in class com.pizza_group.project4.MainController
openChicagoPizza() creates a new stage and sets root to proper fxml file for Chicago Style Pizza Ordering View window.
openNewYorkPizza() - Method in class com.pizza_group.project4.MainController
openNewYorkPizza() creates a new stage and sets root to proper fxml file for New York Style Pizza Ordering View window.
Order - Class in com.pizza_group.project4
Order class contains all the information needed to handle orders containing the pizza classes and the functions that help support actions for maintaining an order such as adding and removing pizzas from an order.
Order() - Constructor for class com.pizza_group.project4.Order
Constructor to create a pizza object containing an observable list for all the pizzas.
